ImageDisplayPanel - Class in gladosPackage
A JPanel which automatically displays one of the MNIST images, depending on its constructor, either by finding the image associated with an image number or by creating the image from a byte array.
ImageDisplayPanel(int) - Constructor for class gladosPackage.ImageDisplayPanel

incrementWeights(double) - Method in class gladosPackage.AbstractNeuron
Increments all the neuron's weight according to its current weight gradients and the given learningRate

InputNeuron - Class in gladosPackage
The simples of all AbstractNeurons it simply transmits the input to the output.
InputNeuron() - Constructor for class gladosPackage.InputNeuron
 
IntermediateNeuron - Class in gladosPackage
The most versatile AbstractNeuron, it is made to be part of the hidden layers and thus have both an inputNeuron layer and an outputNeuron layer
IntermediateNeuron(int, double) - Constructor for class gladosPackage.IntermediateNeuron
